author: Rebecca Falconer
title: African Americans are dying from coronavirus at higher rates in many U.S. communities
description: U.S. Surgeon General Jerome Adams has highlighted the disproportionate impact the novel coronavirus is having on African American communities, telling CBS Tuesday: "many black Americans are at higher risk for COVID." Driving the news: Several states and citie…
content:
U.S. Surgeon General Jerome Adams has highlighted the disproportionate impact the novel coronavirus is having on African American communities, telling CBS Tuesday "many black Americans are at higher risk for COVID."
